message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it offers.
